title: Matterbridge plugin for Wiz over LAN

enableCachedDevices.description: Enable loading previously discovered devices from the cache during startup (this will reuse stored device information to speed up initialization)

resetDeviceCacheOnStartup.description: Reset the device cache on the next restart (it will clear the storage of already discovered devices and the cache files)

bindTo.description: IP address to bind the LAN communication to

debug.description: Enable the debug for the plugin (development only)

unregisterOnShutdown.description: Unregister all devices on shutdown (development only)
